ConverterSection.description: Compress a JPG file to reduce file size and share photos without reducing the quality of your images with Internxt.

howToConvert.title: How to compress a JPG file
howToConvert.description: To compress a JPG file, follow these steps:

steps.description: Upload your JPG file: drag and drop your file into the area above, or upload it from your device to start the conversion.

howToConvert.outro: Compress a JPG file for free anytime you need, knowing your photos are kept secure and private thanks to encrypted uploads.

whyConvert.title: Why you may need to compress a JPG file
whyConvert.intro: Similar to when you have to compress a PNG file, you may need to compress a JPG file to keep the quality of your photos at the highest quality with no watermarks applied to your files. You don’t need to register to compress a JPG file with Internxt, so you can focus on optimizing the storage space for your photo albums and libraries. Once complete, you can:
bullets: Maintain high visual quality of photos
Save storage space on your device or cloud
whyConvert.outro: All your files are encrypted during the upload and compression process to keep your photos private, so you can compress, store, and share your files in confidence with Internxt.

CtaSection.title: Internxt
CtaSection.description: A secure platform to compress, store, and share JPG files
